🛠️ Teaching Tools & Platforms

Powerful digital tools designed to enhance your teaching and transform your classroom. From AI-powered analytics to cultural storytelling platforms, discover innovative ways to engage your students.

12+ Digital Tools
4 Major Platforms
AI Powered

🏛️ Revolutionary Educational Platforms

Cutting-edge platforms that integrate Te Ao Māori with modern technology to create transformative learning experiences.

🏛️

Design Your New Society

Complete 5-week guided inquiry unit where students design their ideal society, incorporating Māori governance principles and systems thinking. Interactive tools and assessment frameworks included.

5-Week Unit Interactive Tools 🔥 Most Popular
→ Explore Platform
📚

Digital Pūrākau Storytelling

Interactive Māori storytelling platform with choice-driven narratives, Te Reo pronunciation practice, and cultural validation protocols. Brings traditional stories to life through technology.

Interactive Stories Te Reo Māori 🌿 Cultural
→ Start Storytelling
🌿

Living Whakapapa Project

Explore genealogical connections through interactive family trees, cultural connections, and environmental relationships. Understand whakapapa as more than ancestry - as connection to all life.

Genealogy Connections 🌺 Identity
→ Explore Connections
🏛️

Virtual Marae Training

Interactive cultural protocol training in a virtual marae environment. Learn appropriate behavior, tikanga, and cultural protocols through immersive simulation and guided practice.

Virtual Reality Cultural Protocol 🏛️ Immersive
→ Enter Marae

🎯 Teaching Management Tools

Streamline your teaching workflow with AI-powered analytics, student tracking, and classroom management tools.

📊

Teacher Dashboard

Comprehensive analytics and resource management. Track student progress, resource usage, and get AI-powered insights for your teaching.

→ Open Dashboard
👥

Student Progress Tracking

Individual student progress tracking with personalized learning pathways and achievement recognition.

→ View Progress
🏆

Classroom Leaderboard

Gamification features to motivate students through healthy competition and achievement tracking.

→ View Leaderboard
🤖

AI Teaching Assistant

AI-powered teaching assistance with lesson planning, resource recommendations, and student query responses.

→ Access AI Hub
🧠

Intelligent Resource Search

AI-powered search through 600+ resources using natural language queries and intelligent connections.

→ Search Resources
🧺

Personal Resource Collection

Save, organize, and access your favorite teaching resources in your personal digital kete.

→ Open My Kete
